BitStreamWriter¶

class zserio.BitStreamWriter[source]¶

Bases: object

Bit stream writer using bytearray.

Constructor.

Methods Summary

alignTo(alignment) Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.
getBitPosition() Gets current bit position.
getByteArray() Gets internal bytearray.
toFile(filename) Writes underlying bytearray to binary file.
writeBits(value, numBits) Writes the given value with the given number of bits to the underlying storage.
writeBool(value) Writes bool in a single bit.
writeFloat16(value) Writes a 16-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary16.
writeFloat32(value) Writes a 32-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary32.
writeFloat64(value) Writes a 64-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary64.
writeSignedBits(value, numBits) Writes the given signed value with the given number of bits to the underlying storage.
writeString(string) Writes the given string to the underlying storage in UTF-8 encoding.
writeVarInt(value) Writes a variable signed integer value (up to 9 bytes) to the underlying storage.
writeVarInt16(value) Writes a variable 16-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.
writeVarInt32(value) Writes a variable 32-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.
writeVarInt64(value) Writes a variable 16-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.
writeVarUInt(value) Writes a variable unsigned integer value (up to 9 bytes) to the underlying storage.
writeVarUInt16(value) Writes a variable 16-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.
writeVarUInt32(value) Writes a variable 32-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.
writeVarUInt64(value) Writes a variable 16-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.

Methods Documentation

alignTo(alignment)[source]¶

Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.

Parameters:alignment – An aligning value to use.
getBitPosition()[source]¶

Gets current bit position.

Returns:Current bit position.
getByteArray()[source]¶

Gets internal bytearray.

Returns:Underlying bytearray object.
toFile(filename)[source]¶

Writes underlying bytearray to binary file.

Parameters:filename – File to write.
writeBits(value, numBits)[source]¶

Writes the given value with the given number of bits to the underlying storage.

Parameters:
  • value – Value to write.
  • numBits – Number of bits to write.
Raises:

PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range or if the number of bits is invalid.
writeBool(value)[source]¶

Writes bool in a single bit.

Parameters:value – Bool value to write.
writeFloat16(value)[source]¶

Writes a 16-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary16.

Parameters:value – Float value to write.
writeFloat32(value)[source]¶

Writes a 32-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary32.

Parameters:value – Float value to write.
writeFloat64(value)[source]¶

Writes a 64-bit float value to the underlying storage according to IEEE 754 binary64.

Parameters:value – Float value to write.
writeSignedBits(value, numBits)[source]¶

Writes the given signed value with the given number of bits to the underlying storage. Provided for convenience.

Parameters:
  • value – Signed value to write.
  • numBits – Number of bits to write.
Raises:

PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range or if the number of bits is invalid.
writeString(string)[source]¶

Writes the given string to the underlying storage in UTF-8 encoding. Length of the string is written as varuint64 at the beginning.

Parameters:string – String to write.
writeVarInt(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable signed integer value (up to 9 bytes) to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarInt16(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 16-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarInt32(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 32-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarInt64(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 16-bit signed integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarUInt(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable unsigned integer value (up to 9 bytes) to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarUInt16(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 16-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarUInt32(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 32-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
writeVarUInt64(value)[source]¶

Writes a variable 16-bit unsigned integer value to the underlying storage.

Parameters:value – Value to write.
Raises:PythonRuntimeException – If the value is out of the range.
